name: Breakout (itch) (tarobic)
description:
Remake/clone/cover I made of the classic video game Breakout. Tools: Godot and Chiptone. Future Square font from Kenney.

Headphones recommended

Controls:

Move - left/right arrow keys or a/d

Slowdown - hold shift while moving

Turbo - hold alt (PC) or option (Mac) while moving

Pause - Space or esc
